definitions.definition: The sacrament of the Lord 's supper .
The ceremony of washing the feet of poor persons or inferiors , performed as a religious rite on Maundy Thursday in commemoration of Christ 's washing the disciples ' feet at the Last Supper .
The office appointed to be read during the religious ceremony of foot-washing.

secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) The sacrament of the Lord 's supper .

( Christianity ) The ceremony of washing the feet of poor persons or inferiors , performed as a religious rite on Maundy Thursday in commemoration of Christ 's washing the disciples ' feet at the Last Supper .
( Christianity ) The office appointed to be read during the religious ceremony of foot-washing.
